Today we honor their bravery and remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice. #DDay78 https://t.co/ZUIlZhuTrf

1 signature.

On behalf of our shared constituents, I call on @LouisianaGov to veto this dangerous bill.

In Congress, I'll continue the fight to #CodifyRoe.
